original_title: 我知道拉登在哪里，请给我五毛钱
overview: Multimedia artist Jiang Zhi's ninth video art film. From his website: "This work...is taken when I begged outside a supermarket. Begging is a way of collecting people’s responses towards major event and attitude about international affairs."
title: I Know Where Laden Is, Give Me 50 Cents
